short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We keep track on your cancellable hotel rooms and warn you if it can be rebooked for cheaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After you've booked a room at Booking.com, we'll check its price daily and mail you if the price goes down. Then you can re-book the same room and cancel the old one.

Users typically save about 20% when we find a cheaper price.
